title: Mr Mo’s Secret
summary: A father who mysteriously disappeared, a mother who killed herself and clues that lie in a web of secrets. To find the truth, I decided to make an unspoken transaction with Mr. Mo, the most powerful man in the city. Who would have thought that a sweet man could be summoned with a kiss! One moment as cold as frost, one moment as hot as a stove, a boyfriend with such duality, I want it all. The quirky girlfriend vs a two-faced catlike tycoon, under the stars, till the end of time, I will only love…

title: How to Make My Tyrant Husband Love Me
summary:
[from cotton candy scans]  
  
“You guys are married from now on."  
  
The person I’ve admired for so long suddenly becomes my husband?! Takatsuki Honoka, 22 years old. I’ve been crushing on someone since I was in high school. He’s my father’s subordinate, the cool and handsome, yet super kind Nagakura Kousuke-san. One day, Kousuke-san suddenly becomes my husband!  
  
Official English translation on Comico's [Pocket Comics app](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics) (color edition)

title: Loved by The Dead
summary: In the Yamatoba Empire, where two races, humans and night demons, have existed since time immemorial. Iku, whose hair and eyes are as pale as white snow, is mistreated by her family because of her strange, demon-like appearance. She is treated as little more than a servant until the day she is sold to a man for money, a fate she thought impossible to escape from... One day, however, the next head of a prominent family, Subaru, learns of Iku's secret and offers her a marriage proposal. Though it is a political marriage, the two, both burdened with a damaged past, gradually become attracted to each other...?

title: Love’s Impossible Quest: For the Broken young lady and the Duke of Dread
Another Heaven
summary:
Dennosuke Uchimura is a simple Salaryman, who one day is run over by an elderly lady on a scooter and left in the street to die. When he regained consciousness he discovers he was summoned to another world by the Demon King himself, who offers him a position as one of his Four Heavenly Kings. 

Can Dennosuke survive as a servant of the Demon King, and meet his expectations?

title: The Almighty Daughter Runs The World
summary:
After traveling through time and space, Ye Zhuo became a fake daughter of a wealthy family and a notorious bastard that everyone disdained. But so what? Although Ye Zhuo was dealt a bad hand, she would still win.

Ye Zhuo quickly made room for the real daughter of the wealthy family and then helped her mother and uncle get rich overnight.

As an unparalleled talented woman, she became the head of a technology firm and had a fortune of hundreds of billions of dollars, directly reaching the pinnacle of her life! Meanwhile, she was having a relationship with a wealthy tycoon who always doted on her!

title: Hunter World’s Gardener
summary:
Ji-ha, the weakest labor-class hunter with neither skill nor fighting ability, made a living by running a store while holding the lowest hunter rank.

But one day, his life as a hunter changed when he entered a garden from a different dimension through his dream...

<You have obtained Friendly Plant Lv.1> <You have obtained Blessing of XXX Lv.1>

'I gained a skill just by planting one twig...?'

His unique adventure as the sole gardener in the hunter world begins.

title: Why I Quit being the Demon King
summary:
In a time of chaos, the Demon King traversed through 665 realms before invading the human realm. It was a brave hero who ceased the war. Thanks to their divine sacrifice, mankind barely managed to survive.

But that led to the story of the new Demon King.

Meet Demon King Demiourgos, the 666th. “I quit being the Demon King,” he said, before leaving the demon realm. This is a story about a runaway Demon King and a hero who becomes his subordinate.

Why did the Demon King quit?

title: Maid’s Night
summary:
After the ruin of an aristocratic family in England, Eva Macy has been living a difficult life as a maid at an acquaintance’s house, where she happens to meet her ex-fiancé Prince Edward.

Despite being a strong and cold-hearted person, he is affectionate towards her. After he leaves, Eva realizes that he’s her first love. However, she decides to give up on her current feelings, believing it to be in her best interest to do so.

After overcoming such a difficult time, Eva's feelings for Edward calmed down, but one day, Edward suddenly appeared before her as if to stir up Eva’s heart again.

Eva becomes a chambermaid for her ex-fiancé Edward, where he constantly tries to seduce Eva.

The relationship she thought had ended a long time ago continues again in his chambers...

title: A Romantic Ending with My 2D Boyfriend!
summary: From flirts to mama’s boys to married men, intentionally Sun Choi keeps dating men like those. Promising to herself, not to date men like those ever again, she developed a game called ‘Dating Simulation.’ Since its release is just around the corner that she went to work even on the weekend and played the game as a developer. She plays a ‘share house version’ where you can meet various men of various classes all at once. However, she gets wakes up in the game as the female character.

title: Disaster Is Always Nearby
summary: Everything seems perfect in Dami Yun's life. Her career prospects look bright, and her childhood crush Ho-won even moved back to Korea to confess to her. But her world turns upside down when an anonymous letter leads her to a mysterious house, where she ends up trapped for three hours… except in the outside world, a decade has passed and Dami has been declared dead! Can Jaenan, the mysterious, surly god and owner of the home, help her navigate this chaos? Why does disaster strike wherever she goes? And why is this unhelpful god having prophetic dreams about them being together?!

title: The Marriage of a Cold-Hearted Duke and a Disaster Lady
Love Letter
summary: Fumi Isshiki works as an accountant at an entertainment agency. One day he is transferred to the management department, where Ayano Haga, a 13-year-old child actress, seems to take a liking to him... She is just a child, yet she acts more mature than many adults.

title: Book of the Dead
summary: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey.

title: Thiendavis – For The Perfect Salvation
summary: Evie Ariatte, a lovely saintess candidate, has her bright future shattered when a sudden curse forces her to answer every question with the truth. This unexpected twist of fate threatens her reputation and jeopardizes her dream of becoming the saintess. As her blunt honesty earns her both friends and enemies, will Evie uncover the hidden truths of Thiendavis and bring about its perfect salvation?

title: Elegant Desire
summary: What’s the chance of running into your first love again after twelve years? This is exactly what happens to Solhui after attending her frenemy’s bridal shower. What’s more? Her first love is having an affair with a married woman. But that’s not all. She meets him and the woman again when she starts a viola lesson with a new student.

title: Goddess’s Way of Attacking Tigers
summary: Moha, the sun god, was betrayed by her lover and died a miserable death. She realizes that she has returned to her past a year ago while being possessed by the body of an unknown woman. Moha struggles to prevent the tragedy of her past life. But, unexpectedly for her, her two tiger gods, who belonged to her in the past, spread their fervent courtship towards her.

title: Steal the Child of the Terminally Ill
summary: “Are you going to leave your child with a terminally ill mother?”The future that the magic mirror, a relic from my parents, showed me was horrifying. A future where I would be a terminally ill mother and my husband’s mistress would demand that I leave my child behind. We’re not even married yet, so maybe we can avoid that unhappy future. You, who resemble the cold snowy fields of the north, cannot hold me. So why are your eyes so hot as you look at me as we speak of parting?”When the old duke dies, we will part ways.””If we don’t have kids, we’ll be fine, right? So don’t even think about divorce. Just stay by my side.”I felt the warmth of your lips on mine as you carefully moved closer. But the deep kiss was just the beginning of a long night ahead.

title: Seoul Station Druid
summary:
What started out as an ordinary day turned upside down when an unknown catastrophe struck Earth, transporting Suho Park to a different planet. He eventually learns how to adapt and fight for his survival in this foreign world, but one day, just as suddenly as he was sucked into this new planet, Suho is pulled back to Earth!

 He quickly learns that return to life as he remembers it is no longer possible, as Earth is in constant battle with monsters who’ve managed to infiltrate the planet.

How will Suho fight against the monsters attacking Earth, and will he be able to survive this time with his current skills?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/guilaideyishijiewangzhe/list?title_no=1771)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/druid-seoul-station/list?title_no=3367)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001631)

- [Official German Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/de/action/the-druid-of-seoul-station/list?title_no=3642)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/druid-seoul-station/list?title_no=3586)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/seoul-station-druid/list?title_no=3301)

title: I Became The King by Scavenging
summary:
Mars, a 12-year-old prince, is terrified of being assassinated. His meals are constantly being poisoned, so he lives on monster meat. Then one night, a beautiful red-haired woman appears and says to him, "You have potential. Become my apprentice." From a single misunderstanding, the boy becomes the most powerful king (even though he doesn't want to)!
___
**Character Designer:** [Shiba](https://mangadex.org/author/a85a847d-d2d4-4a34-aea0-edcf7a56e8e9)

**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/mon29_4ryo)

title: The Silent Sacrifice Princess And The Black Dragons Marriage
summary:
Ayame, born into a family of priestesses blessed by the Black Dragon God, possesses a unique ability to heal people through her voice. However, after the death of her parents, she is taken in by her uncle's family who mistreat her, leading to the loss of her voice. Her cousin Mari even takes over Ayame’s rightful position as priestess, and Ayame is eventually offered as a sacrifice to the Black Dragon.

"Why must I be killed like this?! Someone, please help me!"

Her desperate plea brought forth the Black Dragon from the sky. He descends and transforms into a handsome young man, gently takes Ayame's hand, and flies away with her.

Thus begins Ayame’s new life as the bride of Saku, the Black Dragon, living in his mansion situated between the celestial and human worlds. However, Ayame’s cousin Mari, envious of her new status as the beautiful bride of the Black Dragon schemes to steal him away...

A Japanese-style Cinderella story of a gentle-hearted girl who lost her voice and a proud yet compassionate Black Dragon.

---
The Kozuki family was granted the Black Dragon's blessing, allowing them to heal the sick and purify impurity with their voices alone. But Ayame's life shatters after her parents' death, leaving her at the mercy of her cruel aunt and uncle, who tortured her until she lost her voice. As their daughter, Mari, rises to become the new priestess, Ayame is offered as a sacrifice to the Black Dragon.

"Why do I have to die like this? Please help me!"

In response to her desperate plea, the Black Dragon appears as a striking man and takes her hand, whisking her away to his realm. Chosen to be the bride of the Black Dragon Saku, Ayame finds herself in the enchanting Black Dragon Manor, suspended between the heavens and the human world. But jealousy ignites in Mari, who vows to reclaim Saku and make Ayame suffer once more.

title: Spring Fever
summary: Yusuke Onishi easily gets crushes on everybody and anybody, but never succeeds in love. That is, until the day he meets and falls in love with his new neighbor – a mature single parent. Yusuke has finally met his match. But his match just happens to be a guy! This is a classic oyaji-uke of an unexpected love between two people; one younger, one older.

title: I Contracted Myself
summary: This is a world where awakened people and alienated beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was lucky to become an awakened person, but his ability was rated as useless. He was unwilling to live a mediocre life, so he resolutely swallowed the contract gem that ordinary people avoided like snakes and scorpions, contracted himself, and became his own summoned beast! From then on, the whole world opened up to him. Ever-changing superpowers, endless alienated beasts, and dangerous parallel worlds, everything is possible.

title: Alcatraz of Desire
summary: A shipwreck that occurred under dubious circumstances leaves survivors stranded on a remote, desolate island. On this island, desires begin to take root. The lucky survivors, each with their own hidden agendas, the fierce, voracious beasts, and the cannibal tribe lurking in the shadows are all enemies in the name of survival. On this forsaken, desolate island, who will be able to overcome all odds, emerge triumphant and return home?

title: The Way That Knight Lives As a Lady
summary:
The sword of my closest friend and trusted adjutant pierced my body. When I opened my eyes again, I had become a noble lady of the enemy kingdom. In an unfamiliar and weak stranger’s body, three year’s time was lost, in which my homeland was brought to ruin. I was unable to come to my senses because of the pain of betrayal and confusion of my identity. However, eventually I decided to live on as 'Luciphella Aidine', a noble who wields a sword.  


---

title: Maru is a Puppy
summary:
The hero's son and the ghost of the Demon King are the master and disciple!?

Earth, the son of Hero, the hero who defeated the Great Demon King, is troubled.
Always expected to achieve great things, but unable to meet those expectations.
No matter the effort he puts in, and the results he obtains, it's never enough.
“You're a disappointment compared to your father.”
“Don't you know you're the son of the hero!!”
Living every day like this, Earth meets his destiny in the room containing his father's sword.

“Interesting. I will train you. I have only free time now.”

Earth receives special personal training from the Demon King just to get back at his parents and the world.
In the coming days, his parents, the heroes of the past, his first love, his princess childhood friend, the geniuses of the era, and the world will tremble before him.

**Note:** While initially released with the “What's Wrong With The Hero's Son Being The Demon King's Disciple?” subtitle, in line with the web and light novels, the manga switched to the new “Boy Meets Satan” subtitle by the release of the 1st volume.
___
**Character Designer:** [Ryuutetsu](https://mangadex.org/author/796d659c-1d83-4956-a7bb-d0bcf8424284)

**Additional Links:**
- Official Raw Web Novel: [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354054918478427), [Shousetsuka ni Narou](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9185fm)

title: Prepaid Dragon King Tanks Everything!
summary:
“You ate me, so at least give me some kind of compensation, yeah?!”

Dragon King: “Fine! I’ll give you a prepaid cultivation technique—comprehend it first, then catch up with the training later!”

Me: “You think that’s enough?! I had to smell your nasty dragon breath—mental damage times two, buddy!”

Dragon King: “What do you want from me?!”

Me: “From now on, we’re like immortals sharing a single health bar. All the damage? You take it!”

Dragon King: “Damn it! You lunatic! Why does my ten-thousand-war-chariots-level HP bar feel so short now?! Guess it’s time to get a job…”

title: Without the Male Lead, My Grades Will Fall
summary: High school student Han Jiseo is perfectly happy to be reborn as an extra character in a manhwa. Her side character always scores second place in the entire school, after all! The male lead, Ju Yiwon, is welcome to first place; Jiseo's happy so long as she can get into university. But one day, Ju Yiwon doesn't come to school... and Jiseo scores zero on a test. "Don't tell me... my grades depend on the male lead?!" If Jiseo wants to make it to university, Ju Yiwon needs to be present. Thus begins Jiseo's ultimate mission: make sure the male lead attends school! (Summary adapted by me from Kakaopage.)

title: Worn and Torn Newbie
summary:
After learning 15 miserable years of his life as a failed gamer was one long nightmare, Lee Eojin is glad to be a newbie again! Vowing not to repeat the same mistakes, Eojin starts anew as the hotshot, Stagnant Water. 

He’s conquering monsters, getting sweet gear, and making enough dough to set himself up for life!

 Loved by fans and hated by foes, both old and new, will Eojin break the game and triumph, or will the game break him once again?

title: Worthless Profession: Dragon Tamer
summary: Combining reality with a gaming world where ferocious beasts roam freely, filled with numerous mysteries and dungeons. In order to defend against the onslaught of these beasts, everyone undergoes class transfers and crazily levels up. On the day of his transfer, Lu Fan becomes a hidden class – Dragon Tamer. However, due to the immense strength of dragons, it is deemed impossible for anyone to tame them, earning Dragon Tamer the reputation of being the most useless class. Fortunately, he awakens the Super Treasure Map System. As Lu Fan, with his mighty dragon, sweeps through everything, the entire world trembles.

title: Boundless Necromancer
summary:
[The Tower of Trials has selected all suitable candidates from Earth.  Please select your difficulty.]

Seong-yun Han was just a boy when his parents were killed by monsters unleashed during a mysterious calamity called the “Dungeon Break.”

Seven years later, Seong-yun is devastated to find that his grinding efforts to become a Hunter, fierce warriors who seek out and destroy monsters, are entirely in vain, as his fighting attributes have not increased at all.

Seong-yun’s world flips on a dime when he accepts an invitation to join the Tower of Trials, an otherworldly realm where challengers must overcome trials that pit them against monsters and humans alike!

title: Difficult Boss
summary: No summary available.

title: Aristocrat’s Revenge
summary: No summary available.

title: Magic Emperor
summary:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)

title: Steel Covenant
summary:
Qiao An, a student from the Battle Armor Academy’s elite class, failed the battle armor qualification test and was downgraded to the outer department's logistics class. In the post-apocalyptic world, three centuries after the fall of humanity, Qiao An, burdened with massive debt, unexpectedly discovers that he has already formed contracts with not just one, but multiple top-tier battle armors.




"Black or white, which do you choose?"

"I want both!"




With the strongest battle armors, making money becomes a piece of cake.

"Save the world? Not interested, doesn't concern me."

"What? All my debts cleared? Hey, wait a minute!"

title: Highteen Spoiler
summary: After giving up Taekwondo for over 10 years, Sohee, who lives like a hanryang, has only one interest... k-teen romance! I dream of a future where I will become a lover with 'Soo-hyeon', who is going well. but… One day, So-hee's cell phone syncs a photo that is presumed to be the future, and the boy who became her lover in the photo... It was Lee An-do, an unlucky classmate! can not believe it! There is no probability in this love affair! Even after that, So-hee is confused by the more and more pictures of the future... Will it flow according to the spoiled ending?

title: Logging 10,000 Years into the Future
summary: At the beginning of the martial dao, abnormal beasts invaded the world. Humanity’s martials had to retreat in defeat time and time again. Lu Sheng transmigrates to that time, but in his dreams he enters a world 10 000 years later. The foundational body refining method from 10k years in the future is several thousand times more effective than the current one. Then there’s the breathing method, body refining pill formula, and sacred martial law from 10k years later… Despite developing martial arts for 10k years, humanity was annihilated! Their martial arts civilization reached the apex, and yet there was no one left to inherit it. Except Lu Sheng, he’s exactly that last spark of hope!

title: ‏I Will Fall With The Emperor
summary:
"There can only be one sun."
"Two suns will only burn and kill the empire's people."

Alexar, the great wizard who commanded the empire, after being betrayed by his close friend Gillian Terzios who he trusted and followed, was reborn again as a master swordsman on the outskirts of a small country.

Alexar, the great wizard, moves to seek revenge on Gillian, his close friend and the only nine-star prosecutor of the continent.

title: I Need Someone to Stop My Older Brothers
summary:
I only went to calm the disturbance in front of my house, but the one I encountered was the Demon King that I punished, and unfortunately, I was falsely accused of being the demon king and died in the hand of the subjugation team.

‘I’ll kick your ass, Pamel Asinov! I’ll make you shed tears from both of your eyes!’

Among them, the worst one was the hero, Pamel Asinov, who drove me to death as a Demon King!

But when I pleaded to take revenge, I opened my eyes, 500 years later! Pamel’s been dead for a long time, and the ‘brothers’ who came one day…

“Purple eyes. It’s not a color that anyone can have.”
“But I was like this from the beginning.”
“Yes, you were. Because you are the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov.”
“…the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov?”

Of all people, I’m the daughter of ‘that’ Asinov? It’s nice to live a peaceful life, but I was born an enemy’s blood!

‘All the brothers in this house have a habit of hugging people.’

This shitty family. I have to hate them, but why do I keep getting attached to them?

title: Three Delicious Meals: Just the Two of Us
The Unhappy Poison Witch’s Happy Marriage
Regressor of the Fallen family
summary:
Logan McLain, a middle-aged knight fighting for the independence army, is intent on getting revenge against the empire which took over the kingdom and executed his brother when he ends up dying in battle. But when he wakes, he is a young man again, and has yet to be disowned for his terrible behavior. 

Using his experience and knowledge from his past life, Logan recruits a few talented individuals to develop new weapons, build an army, and make enough money to fund it all. 

But will he be able to make amends with his family and stop the empire's march?

title: Outside Relationship
summary:
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Artist’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/Thank_You_Every)  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Artist’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/31379571)

title: A Fortune-Telling Princess
summary:
A story about an unattractive second-year student, Sakagami, being teased around by a mysterious first-year student who is good at fortune-telling, Mizuki-senpai… But at the same time is actually showing signs that she likes him…

A frustrating and strange romcom begins!

title: Martial Evolution: Start by Awakening the King of Monsters
summary: A youth named Yi He is reborn into the world of powerful Martial arts and awakens the King of Monsters with the strongest bloodline!

title: Eternally Regressing Knight
summary: Is dying repeatedly a blessing? Enkrid's life-long dream of becoming a knight looked to be forever out of reach, until one day he died... and woke up at the beginning of that same day! Now that he has unlimited chances to train and engage in mortal combat, just how far can he go?
